abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn apparently thinks that Greenbrier, the biggest railroad-flatcar maker in the United States, and his American Railcar Industries would be good for each other.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn apparently thinks that Greenbrier, the biggest railroad-flatcar maker in the United States, and his American Railcar Industries would be good for each other.

headline.main: Icahn Pushes for Merger of Railcar Makers
